name: get_cities_in_a_country
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geoapi.
Tool description: APIs to get data based on city and countries name.
- Get Country Details : Get country deatils with country name. Use prefix = true for prefix match.
- Get Cities in a Country :  Get cities in a country wiht population minimum and maximum filter. 
- Get City Detail :  Get city details with city name.
API description: Fetches a list of cities in a specified country filtered by population range, with options for pagination.

country_iso2.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country.

page_size.description: The number of cities to return per page. Default is 20.

population_min.description: The minimum population of the cities to include. Default is 0.

next_token.description: Token for pagination to fetch the next set of cities. Default is None.

population_max.description: The maximum population of the cities to include. Default is 100,000,000.
